scripts.Build-And-Run: node path.js && npm run build && npm run Start-Main-Job
scripts.RunAll: npm update && npm i && node path.js && npm run build && node appendHostsToHostsFile.js && npm run Start-Main-Job
scripts.RunAll-Test: npm update && npm i && node path.js && npm run build && node appendHostsToHostsFile.js && npm run Start-Main-Job-Test
scripts.RunAll-Linux: npm update && npm i && node path.js && npm run build && sudo node appendHostsToHostsFile.js && npm run Start-Main-Job
scripts.RunAll-Linux-Test: npm update && npm i && node path.js && npm run build && sudo node appendHostsToHostsFile.js && npm run Start-Main-Job-Test
scripts.build-full: npm update && npm i && npm i --save-dev @types/node && node path.js  && tsc -b --verbose
scripts.build-full-linux: npm update && npm i && npm i --save-dev @types/node && node path.js && tsc -b --verbose
scripts.test: npm update && npm i && node path.js && jest --verbose --detectOpenHandles
